meanings.definition: Relating to or containing multiple double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The polyenic compound had a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: She studied the polyenic properties of the substance.
meanings.sent3: The polyenic solution glowed under the UV light.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was like a polyenic masterpiece, full of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The polyenic nature of the material made it highly reactive.

meanings.definition: A compound containing multiple conjugated double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new polyenic in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Polyenic compounds are commonly found in nature.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a dash of polyenic to the recipe for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a polyenic paradise of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The polyenic in the mixture gave it a unique aroma.
